transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Hanuman baat kar raha hu.

Executive: Haan ji, salaam walekum.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Ji sir. Boliye. Boliye. 

Customer: Mai mai keh raha tha sir ye payment kara dijiye.

Executive: Are, aap sirf sir sirf aapka kaam khali payment suniye suniye.

Customer: Aapka suniye meri baat suniye aapka kaam sirf only payment lena hi hai. Kya humne humne jo fees kharidi hai. Sir ek cheez bataiye aap. 

Customer: Sir aap sunte nahi hai to fir pehle. Kya bolu mai. Aapne aapko nahi nahi suno suno meri baat. Sirf aap jo hai payment jab aapko account ke bharwana hota hai na. Sir ye jab aap sari baatein jo hai wo agree kar lete hai aap. Thik hai na. Haan aisa hoga haan aisa hoga bilkul aayega sir lekin cheez lenge wo falana dhimka. Sare jod ke chikni chupdi baatein karke agle ko fasa lete ho. Aur fir jo hai account wahi ka wahi pada rehta hai. Aise chal raha hai. Jaise free wala account chalta ho na waise chal raha hai ye.

Executive: Sir services aap jo hai wo time bound nahi hai. Aap do char panch din ho chuke hai aap nahi samajh rahe hai service aapne pure suno meri baat suno aapke aur mere beech me kya baat hui thi. Nahi de rahe. Meri baat to sun lo meri baat nahi sunna chahenge kya aap. Aap

Customer: Meri baat suno. Matlab aapne kaha tha ki 30 din live hogi uske ek minute baad me aapne. Sir aisa nahi nahi mai na aisa nahi bola tha. Recorded recorded hai phone me. Haan phone me recorded hai. Haan bhej dijiye sir agar maine aisa bola ho to. Haan aap bhej dijiye mujhe. Diwali ke baad me kam se kam 24 tarikh ko aapne live kiya hai. Sir aap bhej dijiye. Suno meri baat. Suno meri baat. Meri baat suno. Nahi nahi nahi nahi galat baat hai. Meri baat suno. Jab maine aapko payment diya to maine kaha sir isko fatafat live karo. Aapne kya kaha. Sirf char se panch din dijiye mai live karwa raha hu. Suno meri baat. Maine aapse bola tha. Nahi aapne kab live karwaya suno aapne live kab karwaya. Meri baat sun lijiye. Are suno to sahi. Aapne kab live karwaya. Maine aapko bola tha ki maximum aapne bola maine bola tha aapse ki saat din maximum lagenge agar aap sara lagenge koi baat nahi. Thik hai thik hai de denge. Uske baad aapne kab karaya wo live kab. Suno to sahi. Ya to mai phone kat kar deta hu fir aise nahi aise nahi hogi baat. Aapne live kab karwaya?

Executive: Sir hamare yaha nahi tha aapne humse inside maangi thi wo aapne kitne din me di hai. Wo kitne din me di hai. Suno ji baat karne dega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer complains about delayed live account.

- Customer accuses executive of trapping customers.



Resolution:

- Executive denies promising a specific timeframe.

- Executive asks customer to send recording.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- live account, payment, timeframe
